content.description:
The Easy Route climbs the west face slabs.  Getting to the west side from a camp on the east side was probably not easy! 
                        photo by A A McCoubrey in CAJ 1933

Please see the map on the Leaning Towers page.
A small rack should be adequate.

INTRODUCTION 
 A dramatically sharp summit on the south shoulder of Hall Peak.  The summit was reached first climbed during the 1975 Hall Peak East Face Expedition. 
                        Joe Meyer on Pulpit FA, 1975       
  
 PHOTOS FROM EAST FACE ATTEMPT 1975 
 The team that climbed the first ascent of the East Buttress of Hall Peak also attempted the amazing east face of the Pulpit.  They retreated when the rope got chopped on the third steep pitch. 
                        Joanna McComb bat hooking on the 1975 East Face attempt       
                        Joe Meyers bivouacs on 1975 E Face attempt
